channel.title: netneutrality on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in netneutrality on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Dear Congressman Ted Poe
item.description: 08:49 Saturday 26 May 2018 JST Please support Net Neutrality. Otherwise, you are going to have to pay to get your message out to constituents. In short, I want you and all your fellow member of congress to vote the opposite of whatever Ajit Pai suggests. As you can see on the ArsTechnica(1) website, Pai’s so-called “light-touch approach” of the previous 20 years actually consisted of much heavier regulation than exists today.
